name: Astro Attack (itch) (SnakeByte Studios)
description:
Version: Alpha 1.0.1

2D Space Shooter game

3 types of NPC ships: Neutral, Enemy and MotherShip

Asteroids, health pickups, ship targeting and more!

Github: https://github.com/REX2626/Astro-Attack

Made By: Rex Attwood and Gabriel Correia

With help from: Freddie Weir
